name: GO ON (Marti Mayolas)
description:
GoOn is an hypercasual 2D videogame for Android. GoOn consists in advance trough the diferents levels using your skills and reflexes with your own player (a white ball) avoiding the diferent obstacles that the diferent levels present.  The main goal is arrive to the final line having obtained the three coins that you can find over the course of each level.

------------------

WARNING:

This game contains seguences of flashing lights and imagery that may affect photosensitive viewers.

------------------

Controls  PC --> A & D

Controls Android --> Tap left and rigth 

José Antonio Moreno

Marcel Setó

Martí Mayolas
